column4: Hello, I'm tring to install ubuntu, but once the installation finishes I reboot my pc and i get an error msg "/bin/sh: can't access tty; job control turned off"" and when I click on Crt-alt-F1 I get this: http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/33868/
if thats not the case and ur getting IDE errors then boot with all_generic_ide
at the boot screen, press F6, press space, enter all_generic_ide, enter
you can check md5sum or re-d/l
